Matteo Postinghel

25 years old visual and digital system designer and design researcher, intersecting a human centered approach and new technologies from Munich based in Milan.

Experience

Interaction designer intern at Propp Studio [feb. 2024 - dec. 2024]

Graphic designer intern at 100km Studio [jul. 2022 - sep. 2023]

Graphic designer intern at Labirinto [nov. 2019]

Education

Visting Student at MIT Senseable City Lab [jan. 2026 - jul. 2026]

Alta Scuola Politecnica - XXI [feb. 2025 - ongoing]

MSc, Communication design at Politecnico di Milano, School of Design [sep. 2024 - ongoing]

BSc, Communication design at Politecnico di Milano, School of Design [sep. 2021 - aug. 2024]

BA, Transformation design at Willem de Kooning Academy [sep. 2020 - jul. 2021]

[1]

Oscar Display Variable

Type Design

2025

Oscar Display is a variable typeface built on a square foundation with rounded corners, expanding across nine weights from thin to black. shifting between upright, italic at 17°, and slanted at 34°, it moves within strict geometry while bending toward motion. a system of glyphs that stretches and contracts, carrying rhythm through form.

→ Download Font

[2]

Kinesis

Publishing

2024

The editorial project is structured as a series of magazines entirely dedicated to analog and digital kinetic art. Each issue offers a dynamic experience, exploring works, artists, movements, and technologies of this artistic expression.

Collaborators:

Edoardo Walter Bignami Simone Iasevoli Elisa Paganoni Federico Porro Yeni Tatiana Sartori

[3]

Design Spaziale Italiano

Web Design

2024

I contributed to developing the website for the visual identity of Italian spatial design.

→ Design Spaziale Italiano

Collaborators:

Propp

Pierluigi Anselmi

Pietro Buffa

Alessandro Busseni

Elisa Cappelletto Marco Gariele Giada Fiorenza Giacomo Quinland

The Passenger

Publishing

2024

I contributed to the creation of the maps for The Passenger Alps and London.

→ Propp

[5]

Emergency department of Lodi

Wayfinding

2024

At Studio 100km, I contributed with Luigi Farrauto to the restyling of the wayfinding system for the emergency department di Lodi in Italy, enhancing it's clarity and accessibility through redesigned icons and signage.

Collaborators:

Luigi Farrauto 100km studio

[6]

By.it

Web Design

2024

E-commerce site for discontinued products, accessible in dark mode only in the evening, revealing secrets and stories about the products.

→ BY.IT

Collaborators:

Giulia Cangini

Arianna Cecchet

Elisa Corbetta Simone Iasevoli

Sara Ibarra

Andrea Piersimoni

[7]

RawScenarios

Web Design

2024

Website for the exhibition “Raw Scenarios: Reflection on Human Overconsumption” at Dotdotdot, informing visitors and archiving the projects displayed.

→ RAWSCENARIOS

Collaborators:

Caterina di Noia

[8]

Neptuna

Speculative Design

2024

Neptuna is a speculative design thesis project that addresses the issues surrounding tuna production in the context of climate change. Through ironic and symbolic snacks and a slow distribution experience, it invites reflection on the environmental costs of consumer choices

→ Neptuna - Raw Scenarios

Collaborators:

Sara Balestrini Asia Capezzuoli Eva Cupellini Edoardo Walter Bignami Simone Iasevoli

[9]

Cremona Luthier

Visual Identity

2023

Complete rebranding of the traditional violin craftsmanship in Cremona, an intangible UNESCO heritage. From the logo to visual communication, including wayfinding, social media, and merchandise, the project creates a cohesive and recognizable identity.

Collaborators:

Dorian Wally Abialy Simone Iasevoli Luisa Frezza Edoardo Walter Bignami

[10]

Milan Metro Map

Cartography

2023

I contributed to the concept for the new Milan metro map for 100km Studio, redesigned with a layout that combines a central geographic area and schematic outer zones for the stations. @100km Studio

Collaborators:

Luigi Farrauto 100km studio

[11]

Representation of the Absence and Essence of Blackness

Publishing

2021

A visual essay book that explores the shades of black, from its scientific composition to the deep emotions of artists, giving voice to their inner states through typography.

Collaborators:

Benedetta Giugni Pierfrancesco Pascuzzi Giulia Polimeno
